author: NiharSaha
body:
#### PR description:
This PR has switched all the tracked parameters of DQM/BeamMonitor to untracked parameters to read input collections which is followed by the discussion: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36998#discussion_r815286443

#### PR validation:
Tested in CMSSW_12_4_X via runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
NA
title: Migration to untracked parameters in DQM/BeamMonitor package
